rationale: The segment contains 'biggest outbreak' but it modifies 'outbreak', not a risk-adjective describing the virus.
statement_text: Czech authorities are preparing to destroy up to 220,000 hens on a poultry farm in the west of the country after bird flu was discovered there last week, in the biggest outbreak to date.

rationale: The phrase 'biggest outbreak' uses a superlative + noun, framing the scale alarmingly.
statement_text: Czech authorities are preparing to destroy up to 220,000 hens on a poultry farm in the west of the country after bird flu was discovered there last week, in the biggest outbreak to date.
